review_text: Here for business meetings, had some glitches with services like wifi and AV but we're fixed immediately, even though they were our mistakes not the hotel's. Others have pointed out interior vs exterior rooms. Rooms are spacious with floor butler at your service. Awesome!Thank you very much for your recent review on TripAdvisor. We truly appreciate you taking the time to detail your experience, and we are so pleased that you had a wonderful visit at The St. Regis New York. We will share your comments about our business accommodations with our team members, and we grateful of your praises.We look forward to welcoming you back as our guest in the near future!
